# Welcome to *PlaqView* !

## **Instructions:**

1.  Click on the dataset you wish to explore in the data table below.

2.  Click the Load Data Button to load into your session.

3.  Explore your dataset! (visit the various tabs like Gene Lookup).

4.  (Optional) return to this page to change to another dataset.
